index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to economic development; authorizing the Central Area Capital Fund program; amending he 1995 Budget to reallocate 1994 and 1995 Community Development Block Grant ("CDBG") funds from the Department of Housing and Human Services to the Office of Economic Development for Central Area development; approving expenditure of the balance of the City of Seattle's 1991 HUD Special Grant for economic development activities in the Central Area; and authorizing amendments to the City of Seattle's 1994 CDBG Final Statement and the 1995 Consolidated Plan.
